      ## overall BMF for ECO
      ## col1: center of halo mass bin
      ## col2: phi_50
      ## col3: phi_16
      ## col4: phi_84
      ## col2-4 in raw number counts/bin, divide by 151843.4/h^3 to normalize to per Mpc^3 (typically choose h=0.7)
      ## divide by 0.2 to normalize to per dex
